description: Number of integers <= 2^n of form 4 x^2 + 4 x y + 5 y^2.
references: D. Shanks and L. P. Schmid, Variations on a theorem of Landau. Part I, Math. Comp., 20 (1966), 551-569.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to populations of quadratic forms
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
